name: 余盛延
objective: In this semester, we will read and discuss Nadine Gordimer’s The Conservationist (1974) [2F: 823 G661; 1978; 2091455], joint winner of the Booker prize in 1974. We will discuss the novel in detail in terms of its historical context, characterization, stories, themes, and style. Students taking this course are required to engage in a close reading of the novel and participate actively in class discussion. There will be some quizzes and a final exam.
